title: 1956 Ballon d'Or
text: The 1956 Ballon d'Or was the inaugural <a href="Ballon%20d%27Or">Ballon d'Or</a> award given to the best <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player in <a href="Europe">Europe</a> as judged by a panel of sports journalists from <a href="UEFA">UEFA</a> member countries. <a href="Stanley%20Matthews">Stanley Matthews</a> received the award on 18 December 1956.
